I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.
i m the youngest of five.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to?
Hey, I am just writing in my journal. What about you?
I am getting ready for work. I am a server at a restaurant.
Oh, fun! What type of food do you serve?
We serve American food. My favorite food is sushi.
I love sushi! I have been trying to learn how to make it.
That is awesome! Do you like to cook?
I love to cook! I just have not mastered making sushi yet.
I am sure you will get it eventually! What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta! I love making it because it is easy and there are so many different ways to make it.
That sounds delicious! I love pasta too!
What is your favorite thing to do in the winter?
I love to go skiing! I love the snow and the feeling of being on the mountain.
Skiing sounds so fun! I have never been skiing before.
Oh, you should try it! It is so much fun!
I will! I am sure I would love it.
I am sure you would! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read! I love getting lost in a good book.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read anything by Stephen King. I also love the Harry Potter series.
I love the Harry Potter series too! I have read them all multiple times.
I am so glad someone else loves them! They are my favorite books.
They are mine too! What do you like about them?
I love the characters and the story. It is so well done.
I agree! I love the way that the story is told.
Me too! It is so well written.
I am so glad that you like the Harry Potter series!
Me too! I am so glad that I found someone else who loves them.
